018package org.opt4j.optimizers.ea;
019
020import static org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Citation.PublicationMonth.UNKNOWN;
021
022import org.opt4j.core.common.archive.Crowding;
023import org.opt4j.core.common.archive.FrontDensityIndicator;
024import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Citation;
025import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Info;
026import org.opt4j.core.start.Constant;
027
028/**
029 * Module for the {@link Nsga2} {@link Selector}.
030 * 
031 * 
032 * @see Nsga2
033 * @author lukasiewycz
034 * 
035 */
036@Info("A Fast Elitist Non-Dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm for Multi-Objective Optimization")
037@Citation(title = "A Fast Elitist Non-Dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm for Multi-Objective Optimization: NSGA-II", authors = "Kalyanmoy Deb, Samir Agrawal, Amrit Pratap, and Tanaka Meyarivan", journal = "Parallel MockProblem Solving from Nature", pageFirst = 849, pageLast = 858, year = 2000, doi = "10.1007/3-540-45356-3_83", month = UNKNOWN)
038public class Nsga2Module extends SelectorModule {
039
040        @Info("The tournament value")
041        @Constant(value = "tournament", namespace = Nsga2.class)
042        protected int tournament = 0;
043
044        /**
045         * Returns the tournament value.
046         * 
047         * @see #setTournament
048         * @return the tournament value
049         */
050        public int getTournament() {
051                return tournament;
052        }
053
054        /**
055         * Sets the tournament value.
056         * 
057         * @see #getTournament
058         * @param tournament
059         *            the tournament to set
060         */
061        public void setTournament(int tournament) {
062                this.tournament = tournament;
063        }
064
065        /*
066         * (non-Javadoc)
067         * 
068         * @see org.opt4j.start.Opt4JModule#config()
069         */
070        @Override
071        public void config() {
072                bindSelector(Nsga2.class);
073                bind(FrontDensityIndicator.class).to(Crowding.class);
074        }
075
076}
